com.cyc.session.internal

Class TestEnvironmentProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cyc.session.internal.TestEnvironmentProperties

  • public class TestEnvironmentProperties
extends Object
    Retrieves various test-scope configuration settings from the System properties. These properties may be set within the maven-surefire-plugin configuration in the project's pom.xml: org.apache.maven.plugins maven-surefire-plugin cyc.test.includeGuiElementTests false ... ...
